title: Events Marketing Working Student (w/m/d)
content:
To reinvent an industry, you have to build the best team. Join Formlabs if you want to bring groundbreaking professional 3D printers to the desktops of every designer, engineer, researcher, and artist in the world.
Formlabs develops the most powerful and thoughtful software experiences in the industry. 3D printing remains a fairly complex and intimidating process, and our ultimate goal is to bring this exciting technology to a broad variety of users in the most accessible, friendly, and empowering way possible.
If you are excited about creating organizational tools and streamlining processes that help us collaborate with even more people and support our event programming, we want you as an Events Marketing Working Student.
 
The Challenge:

Assist with all administrative/operational tasks for the marketing department
Assist the Events team in various event operations including, inventory management and event setup
Work closely with the Marketing Logistics Coordinator to align on shipping schedules and forecast inventory requirements to achieve shipping deadlines
Curate, procure, and manage both physical and digital assets used at events
Coordinate the participation of external and internal stakeholders, leveraging their expertise across business functions

Your Profile:

Fluent in English (C1/C2)
Experience in Google Workspace or Microsoft Office Suite
Interested in learning marketing programs such as Marketo, Salesforce, and Asana
Work independently and possess an entrepreneurial mindset
Are highly organized and interested in helping streamline processes
Hospitality and customer service-focused mindset

Bonus Skills:

Proficiency in German and/or French (B2/C1)
Passion for 3D printing and emerging technologies
Experience in rapidly-growing startup environments

Our Perks:

An inclusive, dog-friendly office with diverse and inspiring colleagues
In-office catering 3x per week, plus daily free beverages and snacks
Monthly mobility subsidy (incl. BVG Firmenticket & Swapfiets)
Free mental health & well-being sessions with an external partner
Free 3D prints
Urban Sports Club discount
Fun team events

We build amazing things. Come join us!
Even if you don't check every box, but see yourself contributing, please apply. Help us build an inclusive community that will change the face of 3D printing. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

questions.label: Will you require any visa support by us to work in Germany?
How did you hear about us?

values.label: I haven't heard of Formlabs until now

questions.label: What are your salary expectations in EUR?
Which languages are you fluent in? (both oral and written)
